## Plotly 3D plot

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("plotly")
n <- 25;
 
x <- runif(n , 0, 100)
y <- runif(n , 0, 100)

z <- runif(n , 0, 100)
 
r <- runif(n, 2, 50)
c <- runif(n, 0, 255)
 
data <-data.frame(x, y, z, r, c)
 
plot_ly(data, x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z, color = ~c, size
 = ~r, marker = list(symbol = 'circle', sizemode = 'diameter'),
 type="scatter3d", mode="markers")

```
